insert into tb_bbs_content ( bbs_seq, bbs_id, bbs_cont, bbs_group, bbs_sort, bbs_parent, bbs_level, bbs_read,
file_grp_id,
category_seq, bbs_cont_title, use_yn, create_date, create_user_id, update_date, update_user_id, create_ip, fixed_yn ) values ( tb_bbs_content_bbs_seq.nextval, #{bbs_id}, #{bbs_cont}, #{bbs_group}, #{bbs_sort}, #{bbs_parent}, #{bbs_level}, 0,
#{file_grp_id},
#{category_seq}, #{bbs_cont_title}, #{use_yn}, sysdate, #{create_user_id}, sysdate, #{update_user_id}, #{create_ip}, #{fixed_yn} )
mapper.select: select t1.bbs_seq, t1.bbs_id, t1.bbs_cont_title, t1.bbs_cont, t1.bbs_group, t1.bbs_sort, t1.bbs_parent, t1.bbs_level, t1.bbs_read, t1.file_grp_id, t1.use_yn, t1.create_date, t1.create_user_id, t1.update_date, t1.update_user_id, t2.bbs_title, t1.category_seq, t3.user_name create_user_name, t4.category_title from tb_bbs_content t1 inner join tm_bbs t2 on t1.bbs_id=t2.bbs_id left join tb_user t3 on t1.create_user_id=t3.user_id left join tb_bbs_category t4 on t1.category_seq=t4.category_seq where bbs_seq=#{bbs_seq}

select * from (select rownum rn, t1.bbs_seq, t1.bbs_id, t1.bbs_cont_title, t1.bbs_cont, t1.bbs_group, t1.bbs_sort, t1.bbs_parent, t1.bbs_level, t1.bbs_read, t1.file_grp_id, t1.use_yn, t1.create_date, t1.create_user_id, t1.update_date, t1.update_user_id, t1.category_seq, t3.user_name create_user_name, t4.category_title, t2.bbs_title from tb_bbs_content t1 inner join tm_bbs t2 on t1.bbs_id=t2.bbs_id left join tb_user t3 on t1.create_user_id=t3.user_id left join tb_bbs_category t4 on t1.category_seq=t4.category_seq where t1.use_yn='Y'
order by t1.bbs_sort desc,t1.bbs_level ) tbbbs where rn between #{FirstIndex}+1 and #{LastIndex}+1

select count(*) from tb_bbs_content t1 ,tm_bbs t2 where t1.bbs_id=t2.bbs_id and t1.bbs_id=#{bbs_id} and t1.use_yn='Y'
and bbs_cont_title like concat(#{bbs_cont_title},'%')
and bbs_cont like concat(#{bbs_cont},'%')
and create_user_id like concat(#{create_user_id},'%')
and (
case when t1.bbs_cont_title < 'ㄱ' then SUBSTRING(t1.bbs_cont_title, 1, 1) when ascii('ㄱ') <= ascii(t1.bbs_cont_title) and ascii(t1.bbs_cont_title)<= ascii('ㅎ') then t1.bbs_cont_title when t1.bbs_cont_title < '나' then 'ㄱ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '다' then 'ㄴ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '라' then 'ㄷ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '마' then 'ㄹ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '바' then 'ㅁ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '사' then 'ㅂ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '아' then 'ㅅ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '자' then 'ㅇ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '차' then 'ㅈ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '카' then 'ㅊ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '타' then 'ㅋ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '파' then 'ㅌ' when t1.bbs_cont_title < '하' then 'ㅍ' else 'ㅎ' end=#{spell_kor}
)
and t1.bbs_cont_title like concat(#{spell_en},'%')
select coalesce(max(bbs_sort),0) from tb_bbs_content where bbs_id=#{bbs_id} and bbs_level=0
